metadata.topic_title: Natural Language Processing for Report Analysis

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In what scenarios might Named Entity Recognition (NER) fail in cybersecurity threat reports (e.g., due to obfuscation, slang, or novel threat actor naming), and how can Relation Extraction complement it? Debate the trade-offs between accuracy, speed, and scalability in threat intelligence platforms.
